body: Hey guys! Overnight I was thinking of avicus and new game types which could be cool. I then came across the idea "Minecraft Survival Games! AKA "The Hunger Games". We had it on McZone, it was really popular as well.. I don't know if people want it now. But it is really cool and hopefully the Avicus Staff can possibly consider it! Thanks!
body_tagged: Hey guys! Overnight I was thinking of avicus and new game types which could be cool. I then came across the idea "Minecraft Survival Games! AKA "The Hunger Games". We had it on McZone, it was really popular as well.. I don't know if people want it now. But it is really cool and hopefully the Avicus Staff can possibly consider it! Thanks!
title: Survival Games on Avicus!

replies.body: They should replace Elimination with Survival Games, because Survival Games is popular and enjoyable, while even though Elimination is fun, almost no one plays it.
replies.body_tagged: They should replace Elimination with Survival Games, because Survival Games is popular and enjoyable, while even though Elimination is fun, almost no one plays it.

replies.body: If we did re-add it, we'd need ideas to make it more unique. Tons of servers have survival games, it'd be nicer to do something more interesting.
replies.body_tagged: If we did re-add it, we'd need ideas to make it more unique. Tons of servers have survival games, it'd be nicer to do something more interesting.

replies.body:
I want you will add kits, Thats soo cool, than you can upgrade ur kits with money not in-game. overal money on avicus :O
I know its very big, But people will LOVE IT :DD
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Having kits "than you can upgrade ur kits with money not in-game" could be considered pay-to-win going against the newly installed EULA that we all love. That will probably not be happening.
I overall kinda like Survival Games though and believe it should have more thought in the staff team.

replies.body: SG has been milked to death, we don't want another unoriginal clone over here, thanks.

replies.body: I agree. SG does not need to be back. +1 to Gib.
